name: SearX Material Design
description: SearX Material theme inspired by amnesiac33. Developped under 1920x1080 resolution but should automatically adapt to other resolutions. Initialy developped for searx.info, you may need to adapt the domain in the code.
additional_info: CURRENT VERSION: 1.0.1. ------------------------------------- Version 1.0.1: Updated results-well and "try searching for" appearance. Fixed results link hover. ------------------------------------- Version 1.0.0: First deployment, some designed buttons are inspired by amnesiac33 theme.
